rev.comment: /* History */ will try to fix this
removed bare ref to drugbank in infobox
/* Effects on animals */ efficacious treatment in dogs
removed several unsupported treatments; moved petplace.com to external links
/* Effects on animals */ cats and dogs don't mix
/* Effects on animals */ not quite used in Guam
/* Effects on animals */ using a vet. book for lack of a review paper for dogs
Date maintenance tags and general fixes
/* Effects on animals */ The 1st cat ref covers a bit more
/* See also */ NAPQI is linked plenty in text
/* See also */ AM404 link is given in text
/* Available forms */ some facts; hard to follow
/* History */ the two appear to have had a different affiliation (see paper)
Date maintenance tags and general fixes
further edits, mostly for plain english
transplanted tylenol to body of article. Do we really need the chemical name twice with different boldling?
plain english as per Wikiproject Medicine request
